Talon (+1 Longsword).description: A +1 longsword in a silver-chased scabbard. The sword is inscribed with the name 'Talon,' and its hilt is worked in the shape of a bird of prey with outspread wings. It once belonged to a great knight named Aldith Tresendar, known as the Black Hawk. Sir Aldith died fighting off the orcs that attacked through the hidden caverns below his manor.
Talon (+1 Longsword).location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 8 (Crevasse), in a treasure chest at the bottom of the fissure, guarded by the nothic
properties: +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls

Staff of Defense.description: This slender, hollow staff is made of glass yet is as strong as oak. It weighs 3 pounds. While holding the staff, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class. The staff has 10 charges used to fuel spells. Regains 1d6+4 charges at dawn. If last charge is expended, roll d20; on a 1, the staff shatters and is destroyed.
Staff of Defense.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), carried by Iarno 'Glasstaff' Albrek

Spider Staff.description: The top of this black, adamantine staff is shaped like a spider. The staff weighs 6 pounds. It deals 1d6 extra poison damage on a hit when used as a weapon attack. The staff has 10 charges. Regains 1d6+4 charges at dusk. If last charge is expended, roll d20; on a 1, the staff crumbles to dust.
Spider Staff.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin), carried by Nezznar the Black Spider

Lightbringer (+1 Mace).description: This +1 mace was made for a cleric of Lathander, the god of dawn. The head of the mace is shaped like a sunburst and made of solid brass. Named Lightbringer, this weapon glows as bright as a torch when its wielder commands. While glowing, the mace deals an extra 1d6 radiant damage to undead creatures.
Lightbringer (+1 Mace).location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 15 (Forge of Spells), on the worktable in the southeast corner, guarded by a spectator
properties: +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls
glows as bright as torch on command
extra 1d6 radiant damage to undead while glowing

Dragonguard (+1 Breastplate).description: This +1 breastplate has a gold dragon motif worked into its design. Created for a human hero of Neverwinter named Tergon, it grants its wearer advantage on saving throws against the breath weapons of creatures that have the dragon type.
Dragonguard (+1 Breastplate).location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 15 (Forge of Spells), on the worktable in the southeast corner, guarded by a spectator
properties: advantage on saving throws against dragon breath weapons

Hew (+1 Battleaxe).description: A rusty old battleaxe of dwarven manufacture. Runes in Dwarvish on the axe head read 'Hew,' and the rust is misleading. Hew deals maximum damage when the wielder hits a plant creature or an object made of wood. The axe's creator was a dwarf smith who feuded with the dryads of a forest where he cut firewood. Whoever carries the axe feels uneasy whenever traveling through a forest.
Hew (+1 Battleaxe).location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 7 (Dragon's Tower), beneath coins in the dead wizard's treasure chest, in Venomfang's lair
properties: +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls
deals maximum damage vs plant creatures
deals maximum damage vs wooden objects

Wand of Magic Missiles.description: This wand has 7 charges. You can use your action to fire the magic missile spell from the wand and expend 1 to 3 charges. For each charge beyond 1, the spell's level increases by 1. Can be used even if incapable of casting spells. Regains 1d6+1 charges at dawn. If last charge is expended, roll d20; on a 1, the wand crumbles to ash.
Wand of Magic Missiles.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 10 (Dark Pool), clutched in the bony fingers of a skeleton at the bottom of the pool
properties: spell level increases per extra charge

Boots of Striding and Springing.description: Your speed while you wear these boots becomes 30 feet, unless your walking speed is higher, and your speed is not reduced if you are encumbered or wearing heavy armor. Whenever you jump, you can jump three times the normal distance.
Boots of Striding and Springing.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 1 (Cave Entrance), worn by the dead dwarf Tharden Rockseeker
properties: speed not reduced by encumbrance or heavy armor

Gauntlets of Ogre Power.description: While you wear these gauntlets, your Strength becomes 19. If your Strength is already 19 or higher, the gauntlets have no effect on you.
Gauntlets of Ogre Power.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 18 (Collapsed Cavern), on the crushed skeleton of a dwarf buried under heavy rubble at the bottom of the rift (DC 20 Perception to find)

Ring of Protection.description: While you are wearing this ring and are attuned to it, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class and saving throws. This particular ring is from ancient Netheril.
Ring of Protection.location: Old Owl Well, in a tiny jeweled box (25 gp) within Hamun Kost's chest

Potion of Healing.description: When you drink this potion, you regain 2d4+2 hit points.
Potion of Healing.location: Multiple locations: Cragmaw Hideout Area 8 (Klarg's Cave, 2 potions); Redbrand Hideout Area 1 (Cistern, 1 potion); Redbrand Hideout Area 8 (Crevasse, 2 potions); Sister Garaele's reward (3 potions); Thundertree Area 6 (Ruined Store, 1 potion); Cragmaw Castle Area 13 (Owlbear Tower, 1 potion); Cragmaw Castle Area 14 (King's Quarters, 3 potions); Old Owl Well (1 potion); Wave Echo Cave Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin, 1 potion carried by Nezznar)

Potion of Invisibility.description: When you drink this potion, you and your equipment become invisible for 1 hour. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
Potion of Invisibility.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 1 (Cellar), in the waterproof satchel hidden in the cistern (Iarno's getaway kit)
properties: ends on attack or casting spell

Potion of Flying.description: This potion gives you a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. If the potion wears off while flying and nothing else holds you aloft, you must use your movement to descend. If you fail to land before 1 minute passes, you fall.
Potion of Flying.location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 13 (Dragon Cultists), carried by Favric the cult leader in a stoppered vial around his neck
properties: flying speed equal to walking speed

Potion of Vitality.description: Drinking this potion removes any exhaustion you are suffering, cures any disease or poison affecting you, and maximizes the effect of any Hit Die you spend to regain hit points within the next 24 hours.
Potion of Vitality.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 11 (North Barracks), carried by the largest bugbear
properties: maximizes Hit Die healing for 24 hours

Scroll of Charm Person.description: A spell scroll bearing the charm person spell. Can be cast without components if the spell is on your class's spell list.
Scroll of Charm Person.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), in the wooden chest at the foot of Iarno's bed

Scroll of Fireball.description: A spell scroll bearing the fireball spell. Can be cast without components if the spell is on your class's spell list. If of a higher level than you can normally cast, requires ability check DC 13.
Scroll of Fireball.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), in the wooden chest at the foot of Iarno's bed

Scroll of Augury.description: A spell scroll bearing the augury spell. Can be cast without components if the spell is on your class's spell list.
Scroll of Augury.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 8 (Crevasse), in the treasure chest at the bottom of the fissure

Scroll of Darkness.description: A spell scroll bearing the darkness spell, contained in a bone tube.
Scroll of Darkness.location: Old Owl Well, in Hamun Kost's chest

Scroll of Misty Step.description: A spell scroll bearing the misty step spell. Can be cast without components if the spell is on your class's spell list.
Scroll of Misty Step.location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 7 (Dragon's Tower), in the dead wizard's treasure chest in Venomfang's lair

Scroll of Lightning Bolt.description: A spell scroll bearing the lightning bolt spell. Can be cast without components if the spell is on your class's spell list.
Scroll of Lightning Bolt.location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 7 (Dragon's Tower), in the dead wizard's treasure chest in Venomfang's lair

Scroll of Silence.description: A spell scroll bearing the silence spell. Can be cast without components if the spell is on your class's spell list.
Scroll of Silence.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 13 (Owlbear Tower), in the battered wooden chest on the jagged ledge

Scroll of Revivify.description: A spell scroll bearing the revivify spell. Can be cast without components if the spell is on your class's spell list.
Scroll of Revivify.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 13 (Owlbear Tower), in the battered wooden chest on the jagged ledge

Jade Frog Statuette.description: A jade statuette of a frog with tiny golden orbs for eyes. Small enough to fit in a pocket or pouch.
Jade Frog Statuette.location: Cragmaw Hideout - Area 8 (Klarg's Cave), in Klarg's treasure chest

Emerald Necklace (Mirna's Heirloom).description: A gold necklace with a fine emerald pendant. A family heirloom hidden by Mirna Dendrar's family when they fled Thundertree. Hidden in a small wooden case beneath storage shelves in the old herb and alchemy shop.
Emerald Necklace (Mirna's Heirloom).location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 9 (Herbalist's Shop), in a hidden compartment beneath storage shelves (DC 15 Perception, automatic if Mirna sent the party)
properties: returning it to Mirna awards 200 XP

Silver Comb (Sister Garaele's Gift).description: A jeweled silver comb intended as a gift for the banshee Agatha. If presented to Agatha, the Charisma (Persuasion) check to get her to answer a question is automatically successful.
Silver Comb (Sister Garaele's Gift).location: Given by Sister Garaele at the Shrine of Luck in Phandalin
properties: automatically succeeds on persuasion check with Agatha

Gold Statuette of Sun Elf.description: A gold statuette of a sun elf wrapped in crimson cloth. Imbued with divination magic. Any non-evil creature grasping the statue can ask it a question and receive a telepathic response, as though it had cast augury. Once a creature has asked its question, it can never activate the statuette again.
Gold Statuette of Sun Elf.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 8 (Dark Hall), hidden under a mound of coal in a stone brazier

Platinum Signet Rings (Tresendar).description: Platinum signet rings found amid the bones in the Tresendar family sarcophagi. Three rings total, one per sarcophagus.
Platinum Signet Rings (Tresendar).location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 4 (Tresendar Crypts), inside the three stone sarcophagi

Gold Earring with Ruby.description: A gold earring set with a tiny ruby, found among gambling stakes.
Gold Earring with Ruby.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 10 (Common Room), on the table among gambling stakes

Mosk's Jeweled Eye Patch.description: An eye patch made of black leather set with semiprecious stones, worn by the bugbear Mosk despite having both eyes. He thinks it's fancy.
Mosk's Jeweled Eye Patch.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 9 (Guard Barracks), worn by the bugbear Mosk

Engraved Quarterstaff.description: A fine quarterstaff engraved with stylized feathers. Surprisingly light at only 1 lb.
Engraved Quarterstaff.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 6 (Hobgoblin Barracks), mounted on the wall among other weapons

Sildar's Longsword.description: A longsword with the emblem of Neverwinter worked into its hilt. Belongs to Sildar Hallwinter, who is grateful if it is returned.
Sildar's Longsword.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 5 (Storeroom), along with Sildar's chain mail

Sildar's Chain Mail.description: A bloody suit of chain mail belonging to Sildar Hallwinter.
Sildar's Chain Mail.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 5 (Storeroom), along with Sildar's longsword

Golden Ritual Implements.description: Golden ritual implements including a chalice, a knife, and a censer, carefully arranged on a bloodstained altar dedicated to Maglubiyet. They are human-made art objects repurposed for goblin worship.
Golden Ritual Implements.value: 330 gp total (chalice 150 gp, knife 60 gp, censer 120 gp)
Golden Ritual Implements.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 9 (Goblin Shrine), on the stone altar

Silver Goblets with Moonstones.description: Four silver goblets set with moonstones, part of the dead wizard's treasure hoard now claimed by the green dragon Venomfang.
Silver Goblets with Moonstones.location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 7 (Dragon's Tower), in the old wooden chest on the tower floor

Diamonds (Cultist Tribute).description: Three diamonds carried by the dragon cultist Favric as tribute for the green dragon Venomfang.
Diamonds (Cultist Tribute).location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 13 (Dragon Cultists), in Favric's small coffer

Wooden Pipe with Platinum Filigree.description: A wooden pipe adorned with platinum filigree, treasured by the wraith Mormesk. He will not relinquish it under any circumstances.
Wooden Pipe with Platinum Filigree.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 14 (Wizards' Quarters), in the scorched iron chest

Platinum Rings (Wave Echo Cave).description: Two platinum rings found on the skeleton of a human wizard who died defending the mines.
Platinum Rings (Wave Echo Cave).location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 10 (Dark Pool), on a skeleton at the bottom of the pool

Dwarven Ale Mug (Electrum).description: A dwarven ale mug made of hammered electrum, found among Nezznar's collected treasure.
Dwarven Ale Mug (Electrum).location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin), in Nezznar's treasure sack on the wooden table

Gundren's Map to Wave Echo Cave.description: A map showing the location of Wave Echo Cave. Essential quest item that Gundren Rockseeker and his brothers used to find the lost mine. Sought by the Black Spider.
Gundren's Map to Wave Echo Cave.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 14 (King's Quarters), hidden under King Grol's bed mattress in a stitched leather sack

Black Spider's Letter.description: A letter from the Black Spider to Iarno/Glasstaff ordering him to capture or kill strangers arriving in Phandalin and to deliver any dwarven maps. Signed with the Black Spider's symbol.
Black Spider's Letter.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), on the writing desk
properties: connects Glasstaff to the Black Spider

Dwarven Brandy.description: One small cask of exceptional dwarven brandy, overlooked by the goblins because of its small size. Contains the equivalent of twenty glasses. A character who imbibes a glass regains 1 hit point, but a character who drinks two glasses within 1 hour becomes poisoned for 1 hour.
Dwarven Brandy.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 5 (Storeroom), among the provisions
properties: poisoned condition if 2 glasses within 1 hour

Brazier of Green Flame.description: A stone pedestal holding a small brazier in which an eerie green flame dances and crackles. The source of the magic that suffuses the Forge of Spells caverns. The magic has waned over the years but any nonmagical weapon or armor bathed in the green flame for at least 1 minute becomes a +1 weapon or +1 armor for 1d12 hours.
Brazier of Green Flame.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 15 (Forge of Spells), in the middle of the room on a stone pedestal
properties: temporarily enchants weapons/armor to +1 for 1d12 hours
requires 1 minute of bathing in flame

Urmon's Journal.description: A tome written in Dwarvish. The journal of an adventurer named Urmon that describes the history of the Lost Mine of Phandelver and the Forge of Spells. Records that a magic mace named Lightbringer was commissioned by priests of Lathander from the mages working with the gnomes and dwarves of the Phandelver's Pact.
Urmon's Journal.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 11 (Wizard's Workshop), among the books and notes on the shelves

Rare Reagents (Mercury, Dragon Bile, Pow.description: Three small bottles holding rare alchemical reagents: mercury, dragon bile, and powdered nightshade. Part of Iarno's alchemical supplies.

Garnets (Redbrand Barracks).description: Two garnets found in a Redbrand ruffian's belt pouch.
Garnets (Redbrand Barracks).location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 2 (Barracks), in the third ruffian's belt pouch

Carnelians (Glasstaff's Chest).description: Five carnelian gemstones found in Iarno's treasure chest.
Carnelians (Glasstaff's Chest).location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), in the wooden chest

Peridots (Glasstaff's Chest).description: Two peridot gemstones found in Iarno's treasure chest.
Peridots (Glasstaff's Chest).location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), in the wooden chest

Pearl (Glasstaff's Chest).description: A single pearl found in Iarno's treasure chest.
Pearl (Glasstaff's Chest).location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), in the wooden chest

Pearl (Old Owl Well).description: A single pearl found in Hamun Kost's treasure.
Pearl (Old Owl Well).location: Old Owl Well, in Hamun Kost's chest

Malachite Gems.description: Five malachite gemstones found in the nothic's treasure chest.
Malachite Gems.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 8 (Crevasse), in the treasure chest at the bottom of the fissure

Diamonds (Mormesk's Treasure).description: Three diamonds found in the scorched chest of the wraith Mormesk.
Diamonds (Mormesk's Treasure).location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 14 (Wizards' Quarters), in the scorched iron chest

Small Gemstones (Nezznar's Treasure).description: Nine small gemstones found in Nezznar's treasure sack.
Small Gemstones (Nezznar's Treasure).location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin), in Nezznar's treasure sack

Vials of Perfume.description: Three vials of perfume found in the orc camp treasure chest at Wyvern Tor.
Vials of Perfume.location: Wyvern Tor - Orc Camp, in an unlocked treasure chest

Tiny Jeweled Box.description: A tiny jeweled box containing the Ring of Protection from ancient Netheril.
Tiny Jeweled Box.location: Old Owl Well, in Hamun Kost's chest

Studded Leather Armor (Thundertree).description: Studded leather armor worn by the corpse of an unfortunate male elf adventurer found cocooned in spider silk.
Studded Leather Armor (Thundertree).location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 6 (Ruined Store), on the spider-wrapped elf corpse

Shortsword (Thundertree).description: A shortsword in a scabbard at the hip of the dead elf adventurer found cocooned in spider silk.
Shortsword (Thundertree).location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 6 (Ruined Store), on the spider-wrapped elf corpse

Lionshield Coster Supplies.description: Stolen supplies marked with the blue lion symbol of the Lionshield Coster merchant company. Bulky crates and sacks of looted provisions requiring a wagon to transport. Returning them earns a reward.
Lionshield Coster Supplies.location: Cragmaw Hideout - Area 8 (Klarg's Cave), piled in the south end of the cave
properties: 50 gp reward from Linene Graywind at Lionshield Coster

Gundren's Wagon Supplies.description: A wagonload of mining supplies and food including a dozen sacks of flour, several casks of salted pork, two kegs of strong ale, shovels, picks, crowbars (about a dozen each), and five lanterns with a small barrel of oil (about fifty flasks in volume).
Gundren's Wagon Supplies.value: 100 gp total cargo value, 10 gp per character for delivery
Gundren's Wagon Supplies.location: Triboar Trail - with the party's wagon from the start of the adventure
properties: delivery earns 10 gp per character from Barthen's Provisions

Redbrand Armory Weapons.description: A stockpile of weapons the Redbrands have been gathering for expansion. Includes twelve spears, six shortswords, four longswords, six light crossbows, and eight quivers holding twenty crossbow bolts each.
Redbrand Armory Weapons.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 6 (Armory), in weapon racks along the walls

Scarlet Cloaks.description: Dirty red cloaks worn by the Redbrands. Can be used as disguises to fool Redbrands or even bugbears into thinking the party serves Iarno. A dozen hang in the armory, and more can be looted from defeated ruffians.
Scarlet Cloaks.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 6 (Armory), hanging from hooks by the door; also worn by all Redbrand ruffians
properties: recognized by Redbrands and Tresendar Crypt skeletons

Coin Hoard - Klarg's Cave.description: Coins found in Klarg's treasure chest in the Cragmaw Hideout.
Coin Hoard - Klarg's Cave.location: Cragmaw Hideout - Area 8 (Klarg's Cave), in the unlocked treasure chest

Coin Hoard - Redbrand Cistern.description: Coins in Iarno's emergency getaway satchel hidden in the cistern.
Coin Hoard - Redbrand Cistern.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 1 (Cellar), in waterproof satchel in the cistern

Coin Hoard - Redbrand Crevasse.description: Coins in the nothic's treasure chest at the bottom of the crevasse.
Coin Hoard - Redbrand Crevasse.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 8 (Crevasse), in the treasure chest

Coin Hoard - Glasstaff's Chest.description: Coins representing the Redbrands' best loot over two months.
Coin Hoard - Glasstaff's Chest.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 12 (Glasstaff's Quarters), in the wooden chest

Coin Hoard - Common Room Gambling.description: Coins and trinkets on the gambling table in the Redbrand common room.
Coin Hoard - Common Room Gambling.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 10 (Common Room), on the table

Coin Hoard - Thundertree Merchant.description: A chest of coins hidden under the flagstone floor of an old merchant's home in Thundertree.
Coin Hoard - Thundertree Merchant.location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 2 (Blighted Cottages), under the flagstone floor of the eastern cottage (DC 10 Perception)

Coin Hoard - Dragon's Tower.description: Coins from the dead wizard's treasure hoard, now guarded by the green dragon Venomfang.
Coin Hoard - Dragon's Tower.location: Ruins of Thundertree - Area 7 (Dragon's Tower), in the old wooden chest on the tower floor

Coin Hoard - Wyvern Tor.description: Coins in the orc camp's treasure chest at Wyvern Tor.
Coin Hoard - Wyvern Tor.location: Wyvern Tor - Orc Camp, in an unlocked treasure chest

Coin Hoard - Old Owl Well.description: Coins in Hamun Kost's traveling chest.
Coin Hoard - Old Owl Well.location: Old Owl Well, in Hamun Kost's chest

Coin Hoard - Owlbear Tower.description: Coins found in a battered wooden chest on a jagged ledge in the owlbear tower.
Coin Hoard - Owlbear Tower.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 13 (Owlbear Tower), on a jagged second-floor ledge (DC 15 Perception to notice)

Coin Hoard - King Grol's Chamber.description: Coins hidden under King Grol's bed mattress in a stitched leather sack.
Coin Hoard - King Grol's Chamber.location: Cragmaw Castle - Area 14 (King's Quarters), under the bed mattress

Coin Hoard - Assayers' Office.description: An old pay chest locked in an iron strongbox behind the counter of the mine's assayers' office.
Coin Hoard - Assayers' Office.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 5 (Assayers' Office), in a locked iron strongbox behind the counter (DC 20 Dexterity to pick)

Coin Hoard - Mormesk's Chest.description: Coins in the scorched chest of the wraith Mormesk.
Coin Hoard - Mormesk's Chest.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 14 (Wizards' Quarters), in the scorched iron chest

Coin Hoard - Nezznar's Sack.description: Coins collected by Nezznar during his exploration of Wave Echo Cave.
Coin Hoard - Nezznar's Sack.location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin), in Nezznar's treasure sack on the wooden table

Yeemik's Pouch.description: A pouch containing three gold teeth and some silver coins, carried by the goblin leader Yeemik.
Yeemik's Pouch.location: Cragmaw Hideout - Area 6 (Goblin Den), carried by goblin leader Yeemik

Mosk's Belt Pouch.description: A belt pouch carried by the bugbear leader Mosk in the Redbrand Hideout.
Mosk's Belt Pouch.location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 9 (Guard Barracks), carried by bugbear Mosk

Hobgoblin Bounty Sketch.description: A crudely drawn sketch of one party member carried by a hobgoblin, with '25 gold pieces for this one' and a symbol of a black spider drawn beneath it.
Hobgoblin Bounty Sketch.location: Random wilderness encounter - carried by hobgoblin patrol
properties: evidence of Black Spider's bounty on the party

Iron Key (Redbrand).description: An iron key that locks and unlocks all the doors in the Redbrand hideout. Carried by the bugbear Mosk.
Iron Key (Redbrand).location: Redbrand Hideout - Area 9 (Guard Barracks), carried by bugbear Mosk

Iron Key (Wave Echo Cave).description: An iron key with a head shaped like an anvil. Unlocks the door to Area 20 (Priests' Quarters) in Wave Echo Cave. Carried by Nezznar.
Iron Key (Wave Echo Cave).location: Wave Echo Cave - Area 19 (Temple of Dumathoin), carried by Nezznar the Black Spider

Heavy Crossbow (Cragmaw Castle).description: A heavy crossbow found among the stores in Cragmaw Castle, alongside Sildar's gear.
